modulesToAdd.title: Python for Data Science
modulesToAdd.reason: Establishes foundational programming skills in Python and essential libraries for data manipulation and analysis, crucial for any machine learning workflow.

modulesToAdd.title: Fundamentals of Machine Learning
modulesToAdd.reason: Introduces core machine learning concepts, algorithms, and essential steps like data preprocessing and feature engineering, which are central to the job market skills.

modulesToAdd.title: Introduction to Deep Learning
modulesToAdd.reason: Covers the principles of neural networks and deep learning architectures, a critical skill for advanced AI applications and explicitly listed in job market requirements.

modulesToAdd.title: ML Model Deployment
modulesToAdd.reason: Teaches practical skills for deploying machine learning models into production using Docker for containerization and FastAPI for creating robust APIs, directly addressing key deployment skills.
